'''Sakuya's Special Gardening Package''' is an item obtained during the [[Dreams of Bloom]] event. It can be used to exchange for one of the following items: {{Card|Flower Stand: Of Yore|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Flower Stand: Fleeting Life|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Flower Stand: Windsong|1|show_caption=1}}
